mapper.select: SELECT id, width, height, photo, name, tel, job, exp, sex, age, email, address, introduction introduction FROM jl_basic_info WHERE id = #{jlId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jl_basic_info ( photo, name, tel, job, exp, sex, age, email, address, introduction, width, height ) VALUES ( #{photo}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{job}, #{exp}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{email}, #{address}, #{introduction}, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE jl_basic_info SET photo = #{photo}, name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, job = #{job}, exp = #{exp}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, introduction = #{introduction} WHERE id = #{jlId}
